TopicTitle: Does Gyroscopic Precession exist in KSP?

Articles.Content:
A couple of patches ago I remember one of the changes referred to changes to angular momentum of some sort or other. This got me wondering whether gyroscopic precession exists in KSP physics.

So I'm putting together a quick video that seems to suggest that it does not. But I wonder... has anyone else already performed extensive testing?
I don't believe that KSP simulates precession. Although there are plenty of bugs that cause your ships to go off course.
